title: Content Creative Director
job_overview:
Creative Director (Full-Time, Remote - PH Based)
Company: BNB Know How (Instagram Personal Brand: Tabare_Sotomayor (INFO PRODUCTS)
Location: Remote (Philippines-based)
Compensation: Competitive salary + bonuses (based on performance)
Working Hours: 9 AM – 6 PM EST preferred (flexible for the right talent)

About Us
We’re a fast-growing, high-performance education and software company in the Airbnb/real estate and sales coaching space. Think: Iman Gadzhi meets Grant Cardone—but with better rental income and cooler branding.

Our brand is bold, clean, elevated, and built for virality. We make info products, high-ticket offers, and automation tools for people who want to escape the rat race through short-term rentals.

The Mission
Your job: make us look like a million-dollar brand. Consistently.
We want someone who can lead the creative direction of all visual and brand assets—including social media, landing pages, content templates, ads, presentations, and sales funnels.

You’ll be the person our content team, editors, and designers look to for vision and direction.

Your Responsibilities
Develop and maintain brand guidelines for visual identity
Oversee graphic/video assets for social (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube thumbnails, reels, carousels, etc.)
Direct creative across multiple products: BNB Know How and IG: Tabare_Sotomayor
Collaborate with the CEO, video editors, and content creators to maintain aesthetic consistency
Approve (or destroy) any design work that doesn’t align with the vision
Help build out ad creatives, landing pages, slides, funnels, and more
Suggest fresh creative angles weekly that we can test for virality

Requirements
Minimum 2+ years in a Creative Director or Senior Graphic/Branding role
Proficient in Canva, Figma, Adobe Creative Suite
Strong eye for luxury / modern / minimal / high-converting aesthetics
Familiar with high-ticket digital marketing & personal brands (bonus if you follow Iman Gadzhi, Alex Hormozi, or Grant Cardone)
Ability to manage multiple projects and teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
Must be organized, proactive, and able to take ownership
Solid English communication skills

What’s In It For You
Stable, full-time remote work
Long-term opportunity with growth potential
Direct access to 7-figure CEO + chance to lead creative on viral brands
Bonuses for viral wins or high-performing campaigns
Join a culture of speed, ambition, and creativity

To Apply:
Send us:
a LOOM video of your past work and what you would do to improve our content (Social Media Handles are Tabare_Sotomayor) 
Also tell me your favorite brand on social media right now (and why)
